subject: Greetings
body:
Greetings
  How do you do? I previously contacted you with my company email (
sonangolep@mail.ee
 ) and I must commend your swift response and your attention has already made the business project a success. This is my work email, kindly feel free to communicate with me via this email. I work for Sonangol EP Oil and Gas, as the assistant director, licensing and marketing department based here in London, United Kingdom.
 
With all due respect, my reason for making this contact with you is that, using the influence of my current official position in Sonangol EP Oil and Gas, I intend to facilitate the immediate transfer of a crude oil lifting license No: COA/6490-100/**** which was formerly operated by your national. And you have been selected as the new operator(Entitled Owner to some Barrels of Crude Oil) because you share the same last name.  Reason behind this is, Mr Allen was deceased some months ago due to the Covid-19 and the crude oil lifting license still has a validity of (3) Three Years remaining till expiration in June of 2027.This license will be transferred to you as the legal grantee and the lifting license will give you/us the legal authority to become crude oil sales agents for Sonangol EP, thereby giving us the opportunity to start earning substantial monthly proceeds as commissions.
 
My obligation in this proposed partnership is to continuously ensure that the quantity of crude oil/Gas allocated to you as the licensee beneficiary is sold at market value while your obligation as the licensee is to receive accruing monthly commissions from sales. The referenced license number has a monthly allocation of (1) One Million Barrels for the next (3) 3 Years which means we will have a guaranteed sale capacity of 1 Million Barrels per month.
 
ESTIMATED MONTHLY EARNINGS:
I will ensure a USD$2.00 discount applies from the local Petroleum Agency [Sonangol EP] which translates to USD$2 Million monthly and also a USD$2 commission from the buyer as well. This amounts to a total guaranteed monthly income of USD$4Million to our partnership per month for the next three years.
REASON TO CONTACT YOU:
As a staff of Sonangol EP, I am not officially allowed to own/operate a crude oil lifting license while employed within the agency, this is to avoid a conflict of interests. This is why I humbly seek to partner with you to become the license owner/operator, while I use my position/network within the organization to assist our partnership and ensure your license application is approved with a guaranteed flow of sales activities of the crude oil which is the toughest part of operating a sales license.
 I propose that we split the proceeds from these sales on a balanced and equity basis of 50:50 apiece. I believe that this is a very fair deal as both of us will be assured of a minimum income of USD$2Million at the end of the monthly sales cycle for the next (3) Years at the minimum.
 
I assure you that I have made this proposal to you today in the utmost sincerity of purpose and intention, and I naturally expect some amount of discretion as you may come to deal with sensitive or confidential business documents and information in our subsequent correspondence. I am willing to provide further details as you may require and answer any questions you may have in regards to this proposal. Kindly treat your response to this proposal as a matter of urgency as time is of the essence in this matter. I hope to read from you soon.
Regards,
Christopher Lee

subject: Re:   Greetings
body:
Hello Lee,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining this opportunity in such detail. I must say, it sounds like a very interesting proposition. However, I have a few questions that I hope you could help me understand better.

Firstly, how did you come across my name and why was I specifically chosen for this? Also, could you please explain more about the crude oil lifting license? What exactly does it entail and what would be my responsibilities as the licensee?

I'm also curious about the sales process. How does it work and who would be our potential buyers? And lastly, could you provide more information on how the proceeds from these sales are calculated?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Greetings Jerry
body:
Hello,
 Thank you for the swift response. Let me elaborate more about this project, it's 100% legit and your attention is required because this is a very huge business venture that requires some of your time as we are going to work together and a lawyer will be provided that will represent you in all capacity relating to this business venture.  Our profit originates from the money the buyer pays Sonangol EP for the product after a monthly sales operation is conducted.For example, if the market price per barrel is USD$94.00; as a license operator, Sonangol EP approves the product to you at a discounted value of USD$92.00 and you sell to a buyer at the normal market price of USD$94.00 which means you/we earn a commission of USD$2.00 on every barrel sold from the approved allocation. Regardless of the crude oil market price, our commission remains the same.
 I will do everything within my influence to make you understand the intricacies of how this trade works. Our role as the license operator will end once the product is paid for and the responsibility of delivering the oil to the buyer will be handled by the agency. To make this process easier, we shall operate on FOB sales transactions meaning the license owner receives his commission faster without many protocols or risk involved and the required capital is highly moderate. I will use my position to ensure the license is re-assigned to you as the new beneficiary and this will facilitate sales operation swiftly which is the hardest part of the entire procedure.
 My obligation in simple terms:
1. Guiding you through the official process of reassigning the Crude oil/Petroleum products sales license.
2. Helping you provide all the legal documents needed for the license reassignment to you as the new beneficiary.
3. Ensuring that your One million barrels’ monthly allocation is sold in a timely manner.
4. Sourcing product buyers that will purchase the monthly allocations.
5. Guiding you step by step through the sales process until the commission is fully paid to your commission receiving account, this will give you an insight into the intricacies of the business.
6. Making available the upfront investment required for the re-assignment process in your favor.
  Your obligation will be:
1.  The signing of a memorandum of understanding between us and a non-disclosure agreement.
2. The signing of the reassignment documentation pack.
3. Acting as the face of the partnership by communicating with our licensing office and the buyer through email and telephone based on my guidelines.
4. Making sure that 50% of the commission is made available to me within 3 to 7 working days of it hitting your nominated commission receiving account.
5. You will open a checking or business account with one of the accredited banks which names I will provide as soon as possible. The account is where our commissions are paid after every monthly sale is concluded and it will be accessible to both partners as equity partners.
To proceed, I need to be sure you can open a company/DBA or checking account with any good credible banks. Please kindly get back to me as soon as possible. Thanking you in advance for your anticipated cooperation
Regards,

subject: Re: Greetings Jerry
body:
Hello,

Thank you for the detailed explanation of this business venture. It sounds like a very interesting opportunity. I appreciate your commitment to guiding me through the process and ensuring that everything runs smoothly.

I have a few questions, if you don't mind. Could you please explain more about the role of the lawyer in this process? Also, could you clarify what FOB sales mean?

Regarding my obligations, I understand that I will need to sign a memorandum of understanding and agreement. Could you provide more details about these documents? What exactly will they entail?

You mentioned opening a checking or business account with one of the accredited banks. Could you tell me more about these banks? Are there any specific requirements for opening an account with them?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Dear Jerry
body:
Hello Jerry,

 How are you and your wonderful family? This is to let you know that we are making progress because the Company(Sonangol EP) has accepted our request in processing the necessary papers in obtaining our License and the Allocation of our Crude Oil to any of our preferred designated locations.
And concerning the questions you asked, the lawyer will be handling some of the processing of the Vital documents and agreement between us and the Sonangol EP company. We will operate on FOB meaning that we will be responsible for delivering the BONNY LIGHT CRUDE OIL to our buyer's designated choice of receiving location, and this will make it easier for us to get paid without any delay as soon as the product is made available.
The signing of a memorandum of understanding and agreement is the Joint Venture Agreement(JVA) which will guarantee that I have a serious partnership with you. I will let you know regarding the opening of a checking or business account with one of the accredited banks as soon as we get to that stage. And do you have a company account in your name or your company name? I need you to reconfirm your details again:

Your Full Name
Address:
City/Town:
Country:
Date Of Birth:
Occupation:
Phone:

Thank you.
Regards
Christopher Lee

subject: Re: Dear Jerry
body:
Hello Lee,

It's great to hear from you and I'm glad to know that things are moving forward with Sonangol EP. It sounds like a promising venture indeed! 

I appreciate your detailed explanation about the process, it really helps me understand better. So, if I understood correctly, the lawyer will be handling some of the paperwork and we'll be operating on FOB terms, correct? That does sound convenient.

As for the Joint Venture Agreement (JVA), could you tell me more about what it entails? I'm curious to know how it will guarantee seriousness in our dealings.

Regarding your question about a company account, I do have one but I'd prefer not to share my personal details over email for security reasons. Is there another way we can handle this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Greetings Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello,

 How are you? So nice to get your swift response as well. Yes, the lawyer has commence on the legal steps on claiming our entitled Barrels of Crude oil. And the very reason why I will be needing your details so that the lawyer can prepare our JVC tomorrow.
The JVC comprises of all our legal agreement and it will guide you through our partnership, including the transparency and privacy of the business project. You will understand more regarding the JVC when you receive it and it's clear and understandable to clear your curiosity concerning the Agreement (JVC).
Here is my WhatsApp number (+306906834549) you can text or call me, I hope you will be comfortable with it? I will be waiting to read hear from you.
Thank you,
Regards,
Christopher Lee

subject: Re: Greetings Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello Lee,

I hope you're doing well. It's great to hear that the legal steps are underway for claiming our entitled Barrels of Crude oil. I'm really looking forward to understanding more about this business project.

However, I'm a bit confused about the JVC. Could you please explain it a bit more? What exactly does it comprise of and how will it guide me through our agreement?

Also, I appreciate your offer to call or text you but I prefer communicating via email for now. Is that okay with you?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Good Morning Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello Jerry

 How are you and your wonderful family? I did hope you had a great weekend. Sir, I think it will be nice if you receive the JVC and go through it for more understanding regarding our partnership and sharing ratio of our profit.
There's nothing to be afraid of and I want to assure you that you are in a safe hands and all your information shall be protected.
I thought you said you weren't comfortable communication via email? Please kindly let us be straight and understanding in our communication and dealings concerning this business project.
This is an opportunity of a life time and I want you to feel free and follow due processing. Your details are needed today and you will receive the JVC immediately as soon as your information is confirmed
I have also attached a copy of my identity which I expect you to do the same. I will be expecting the necessary information's from you so that the JVC and the invoice regarding the processing of our needed vital document concerning the Lifting and Allocation of our crude oil can be given to us.
I will be waiting for your details and a copy of your identity is needed as well. Thank you.
Regards,
Christopher Lee.

subject: Re: Good Morning Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello Lee,

I hope this message finds you well. It's always a pleasure to hear from you. I'm glad to know that you're taking care of everything and ensuring the safety of our dealings.

Regarding the JVC, I'd be more than happy to go through it. However, could you please explain a bit more about what it is? I'm not very familiar with these terms, and I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

Also, regarding the sharing ratio of our profit, could you provide some more details? How exactly will this work?

As for my personal details, I'm afraid I can't share them over email due to security reasons. Is there another way we can confirm my identity?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello Jerry
  I have tried my best in explaining the content of the JVC and the best way you can understand what it entails is by reading it, the Agreement on the JVC is clear and straight and if you are not comfortable with the Agreement we can do an amendment or you decline from this great opportunity.Sir, I wonder why you feel so uncomfortable sending your details on the internet or via my WhatsApp, and you didn't call me either, it's free to call via WhatsApp. And apart from those two possible means of sharing information, I have no any other means and I'm not a magician. The Sonangol EP will be waiting for us to turn up with some vital documents in your name and address as the rightful owner of the 1,000,000 Barrels of Crude Oil. The invoice on the breakdown of the charges for the needed vital document is ready and it should be carrying your details as the rightful owner of the Crude Oil, but you are delaying the process.Regards,Christopher Lee

subject: Re: Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must admit, it's a lot to take in and I'm trying my best to understand everything. The Agreement on the JVC does sound clear and straightforward from your description.

I'm curious about the process of amending the agreement. How would that work? Would we need to meet in person or can it be done remotely?

Also, could you please elaborate more on the role of Sonangol EP in this? What kind of vital documents are they waiting for?

Lastly, regarding the invoice for the charges of the needed vital document, could you provide me with a breakdown of these charges? I just want to make sure I fully understand what I'm getting into.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Hello Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello Mr. Jerry
 Thank you for the swift response and you are doing the right thing asking the necessary question which is important. I have attached a copy of the exact Agreement (JVC) to this email, you can go through it and as soon as your details is received it will be included in it. I will sign it and send a copy to you for your endorsement, which you will send a copy back to me. My details is already on the Agreement.The Sonangol EP is the company in charge of the Crude Oil sales and production, and our entitled 1,000,000 barrels of crude oil is with them. With all due respect, I will forward all the information on the charges and the JVC to you immediately your details is received.And the list of document needed for the processing of our Lifting License and Allocation is on the invoice and until we receive it after submitting your details that's when I can tell about the exact amount needed for the processing of the vital documents for the Lifting License and Allocation.

Regards,Christopher Lee

subject: Re: Hello Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello Lee,

Thank you for your detailed response and for providing the Agreement JVC. I appreciate your transparency in this matter. I will certainly go through it thoroughly.

I understand that Sonangol EP is in charge of the Crude Oil sales, and our entitled barrels of crude oil are with them. That's quite interesting! Could you please tell me more about how this process works? 

Also, you mentioned some charges related to the Lifting License and Allocation. Could you provide a bit more information on what these charges entail? I'm just trying to get a clear picture of everything.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Re: Hello Mr. Jerry
body:
Hello Mr. Lee,

Thank you for your detailed response and the attached agreement. I appreciate your transparency in this matter. 

I'm curious about the process of obtaining a Lifting License and Allocation. Could you please elaborate on that? Also, could you provide more information about Sonangol EP and their role in this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jerry

subject: Re: Hello Mr. Jerry
body: Can I have your phone number?

subject: Re: Hello Mr. Jerry
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't share my phone number. But I'd love to continue our conversation here! Is there anything else you'd like to know?

Best wishes,
Jerry
